question: Currently, which Economic Census is underway in India?
explanation: 7th Economic Census is being brought out by the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementationâ€™s Central Statistics Office (Economic Statistics Division). A nationwide Business Register as per international practices adopted by developing countries and in line with UNSD recommendations. It will provide detailed information on economic variables, activity wise, of all the non agricultural establishments of the country including its distribution at all India, State, district, village/ward levels for comprehensive analysis of the structure of the economy.
